Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 6/12/1990 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/19/1991, off John Burkett (DET)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Detroit on 7/30/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/1992, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 7/11/1992 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1993, hitting .407 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
